title: Hexen Prozess - Hexen Prozess [Unreleased] (2007)
description:
Hexen Prozess - Hexen Prozess [Unreleased] (2007)

Country: US
Released: 2006
Genre: Electronic
Style: EBM, Industrial, Electro
Size: 82,3 Mb
Bit: VBR 80 - 160 Kbps

Randall Smith (Programming, Vocals ) now member of Die Sektor

Hexen Prozess
In 2004, the name Hexen Prozess was chosen to represent the newly formed project under Randall Smith. Having had experience working with various other bands before that time such as Ausphex, and Diverge, he set out to creat his own realm of music to expose to others. Much of the time from 2004-2006 was merely experimental, but useful in the shaping of what would become Hexen Prozess. In late 2006 to early 2007, Hexen Prozess gained a place in the scene with the help of such bands as Die Sektor and Vicious Alliance. Soon after in March of 2007, Sheridan Willard joined Randall on the Hexen Prozess roster, taking the project to a new level of creativity and production. An official EP is nearing completion in the coming months, so be sure to check back very, very soon for more information.
